name: Beyblade VForce: Ultimate Blader Jam
description: Beyblade VForce: Ultimate Blader Jam is a computer game developed by Full Fat, Nelvana, Takara, d-rights, and published by Atari. It was released in 2003 on the Game Boy Advance in the Beyblade spinoff series. Who you play as in the levels in unknown but you play as each of the Bladebreakers, Tyson, Ray, Max and Kai. You play in a 3D world. You use the arrow keys to move the Beyblade. At the beginning of every level it will show a ripcord/winder with lights going left to right. To get full spin speed you have to press A when its completely at right. If you do not only you get full speed you will automally fill up your bit beast meter .A bit beast meter is a meter that activates the bit beast in the Beyblade. Another to fill up the meter is to defeat enough Beyblades
